head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KING, MONTA NEELY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KING, MONTA NEELY

block.p: KING-Monta Neely. On June 19, 2000 at the age of 83. Beloved wife of the late Ned. Loving mother of Sara King, Billy William Edward King and Doris Schwartz. Motherin-law of Phil Benincasa and Vicky King. Proud grandmother of Laura, Philip, Scott, Adam, Jennifer, Lisa, Neil and Shilpa. Cherished great-grandmother of Sara and Gabriel. Service Wednesday, 10AM, at ''Riverside Memorial Chapel'', 21 W. Broad Street, Mt. Vernon, N.Y.
